examples: it was great to meet old friends again

definitions.definition: returning to a previous position or condition.
examples: he rose, tidied the bed, and sat down again

definitions.definition: in addition to what has already been mentioned.
examples: the wages were low, but they made half as much again in tips
synonyms: on top "this can add half as much again to the price"

definitions.definition: used to introduce a further point for consideration, supporting or contrasting with what has just been said.
examples: I never saw any signs, but then again, maybe I wasn't looking

definitions.definition: used to ask someone to repeat something.
